DOC.brief_title: Aqueous Humor Concentration InSite Vision ( ISV ) 303 ( Bromfenac DuraSite ) Bromday Once Daily ( QD ) Prior Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 old schedule unilateral cataract surgery ( phacoemulsification extracapsular extraction ) posterior chamber intraocular lens implantation If female childbearing potential , subject must agree submit urine sample pregnancy test Visit 1 prior enrollment end study , subject must use effective contraception duration study . Post menopausal define menses least 12 consecutive month . Signature subject Informed Consent Form Willing able follow instruction attend study visit Able selfadminister study drug ( caregiver available instill dos study drug ) Use drug contain bromfenac within 2 week prior surgery Contact lens wear dosing period Known hypersensitivity poor tolerance bromfenac sodium component investigational medicinal product ( IMP ) procedural medication Any serious complication macroscopic damage corneal epithelium Currently pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy ; woman positive urine pregnancy test Currently suffer alcohol and/or drug abuse Prior participation study protocol Prior ( within 30 day begin study treatment ) anticipate concurrent use investigational drug device A condition situation , investigator 's opinion may put subject increase risk , confound study data , interfere significantly subject 's study participation
